description:

Description


Soothe and deeply hydrate your skin with ARENCIA Deep Water Surge Soothing Cream.
Infused with 5-Peptide Complex, Hyaluronic Acid, and Cica, it calms and strengthens the skin barrier.
Its airy, whipped texture absorbs quickly without stickiness, delivering long-lasting moisture.
Perfect for sensitive and irritated skin, it helps reduce redness and dryness.

How To Use

Use as the final step of your skincare routine to lock in moisture.

description:

Description


[MOISTURIZING & NOURISHING]: Infused with TECA, this cream delivers deep hydration and essential nutrients, leaving skin soft and supple.
[SOOTHING & SEBUM CONTROL]: Helps soothe sensitive skin while controlling excess oil production, maintaining a balanced complexion.
[NON-GREASY & QUICK-ABSORBING]: Provides a fresh, non-sticky texture that absorbs quickly, making it ideal for oily and combination skin types.
[ENHANCED SKIN BARRIER]: Strengthens the skin barrier while promoting its natural regeneration, supporting overall skin health.
 
How To Use

description:
Description


Babassu is a type of palm tree native to the Amazon rainforest regions of Brazil. It produces a fruit that contains kernels, from which babassu oil is extracted.

This oil is similar to coconut oil and is commonly used in various cosmetic products such as moisturizers, soaps, and hair care products due to its moisturizing and emollient properties.

- Packed with Omega-6 for a power boost in moisturizing.
- With a melting point that mirrors skin temp, it sinks in like a dream.
- Forms a protective barrier to keep your skin safe and sound.
- Ultimate soothing experience with all-natural ingredients.
- Essential oils straight from the Babassu itself, providing the freshest, most organic experience possible.
- Dense texture that smoothly melts into the skin upon application. It absorbs quickly without stickiness, allowing for layering without residue.
 
How To Use

- Please dispense an appropriate amount and apply during the final step of your skincare routine after cleansing.
- Using it before makeup application will enhance makeup longevity.
- Apply an extra layer to areas needing more hydration, such as around the eyes or on fine lines.
 
Key Ingredients

Water, Glycerin, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Hydrogenated Polydecene, Orbignya Oleifera Seed Oil, Lauryl Polyglyceryl-3 Polydimethylsiloxyethyl Dimethicone, Synthetic Beeswax, Polyglyceryl-4 Oleate, Magnesium Sulfate, Diisostearyl Malate, 1,2-Hexanediol, Cetearyl Alcohol, Polyglyceryl-6 Oleate, Polyhydroxystearic Acid, Hydroxyacetophenone, Sodium Citrate, Disodium EDTA

description:
Description


APRILSKIN Carrotene Clarifying Cream is specifically formulated for oily, sensitive, and acne-prone skin. It helps strengthen the skin barrier with peptides and carrot proteins, while locking in moisture and preventing dryness and skin irritations.
The non-comedogenic formula of this cream does not clog up your pores, making it suitable for acne-prone skin. It helps balance the skin's moisture levels and prevents dryness, while providing skin protection and repairing the skin barrier.
This cream is charged with natural carrot seed oil that supplies rich antioxidants to protect the skin from photodamage and free radicals.
The M-peptide in the formula speeds up the skin cell renewal cycle to prevent future breakouts and calms and soothes irritation, keeping the skin tone bright and even.
Apply in the morning and evening after cleansing and toning. Squeeze a small amount and gently spread it across the face from the center outwards. Pat the skin gently to enhance absorption.
We don't choose between high-performance or low irritation. We aim for both. We use nature-gifted active ingredients to create clilically tested formulas that are fragrance-free and hypoallergenic.

1. Apply a moderate amount on face from inner to outer along skin texture.
2. Gently dab to aid absorption.

description:
Description

Featuring patented skincare ingredients that support skin regeneration, this product helps maintain healthy skin turnover and enhances skin clarity, resulting in a naturally refined and smooth texture
Featuring patented ingredients that help support a balanced skin appearance, this product includes a unique component that helps reduce the appearance of uneven skin tone over time, promoting a more radiant and even-looking complexion.
Supporting the skin's resilience by enhancing the ECM (Extracellular Matrix) layer deep within the dermis. A reduction in the ECM is a key factor in skin aging, contributing to thinning, fine lines, loss of firmness, and uneven skin texture. Structural proteins help activate the ECM layer and support skin renewal, promoting the appearance of healthy and firm skin
Specifically designed for sensitive and reactive skin, with a 0.00 irritation score in human application tests. Picotonic Cream enhances the appearance of uneven skin tone, promoting a more luminous and revitalized look with ingredients known for supporting skin clarity.

description:
Description


Rapidly Soothes
Reduces Redness
Suitable for Sensitive Skin
Hypoallergenic
Dermatologist Tested

Korean Centella Asiatica
Korean Centella Asiatica, an ancient Korean herb, is a renowned soothing wonder. Having to survive the harsh conditions of Korea’s four seasons and diverse terrains, it possesses stronger soothing properties, effectively relieving skin redness and discomfort.

Ceramide NP
Strengthening the skin's moisture barrier, it effectively maintains hydration while providing protection against environmental stressors.

Squalane
Inhibits skin moisture loss and is quickly absorbed, increasing moisturizing power.
 
How To Use
As a soothing moisturizer
After serum, take a moderate amount and massage into the skin with your fingertips.

If you have sensitive skin and are looking for extra soothing, we recommend using the Wonder Releaf Centella Toner Unscented and Wonder Releaf Centella Serum Unscented in your skincare routine.

For instant relief
On days when your skin is particularly sensitive, use a generous amount, more than you normally would, to double as a massage cream.

Water, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Macadamia Ternifolia Seed Oil, Squalane, Butylene Glycol, Cetearyl Alcohol, Glycerin, Centella Asiatica Extract(29,891ppm), Niacinamide, 1,2-Hexanediol, Potassium Cetyl Phosphate, Ceramide NP, Madecassic Acid, Asiaticoside, Asiatic Acid, Behenic Acid, Betaine, Tromethamine, Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea) Butter, Hydrogenated Lecithin, Palmitic Acid, Stearic Acid, Caprylyl Glycol, Candida Bombicola/Glucose/Methyl Rapeseedate Ferment, Carbomer, Xanthan Gum, Hydroxyethylcellulose, Oryza Sativa (Rice) Germ Oil, Cocos Nucifera (Coconut) Oil, Sodium Carbomer, Adenosine, Phytosphingosine, Myristic Acid, Arachidic Acid, Tremella Fuciformis (Mushroom) Extract, Perilla Ocymoides Seed Extract, Sodium Hyaluronate, Beta-Glucan

product_name: Collagen Hydro Moisture Cleansing Massage Cream
description:
Description

Indulge in a luxurious cleansing experience with Enough Collagen Hydro Moisture Cleansing Massage Cream. This creamy facial cleanser gently yet effectively removes dirt, impurities, and makeup from the skin, leaving it feeling clean, soft, and refreshed. Formulated with collagen, this cleansing cream not only cleanses the skin but also provides essential hydration and nourishment. Collagen helps to improve skin elasticity, leaving it looking plump and youthful. The rich and creamy texture of the cleanser allows for a pampering massage experience, promoting circulation and relaxation while deeply cleansing the skin. Simply massage the cream onto damp skin in circular motions, then rinse off with warm water for clean and hydrated skin. Suitable for all skin types, including sensitive skin, this gentle cleanser is free from harsh chemicals and additives, ensuring a mild yet effective cleansing experience. Treat your skin to the care it deserves with Enough Collagen Hydro Moisture Cleansing Massage Cream.
Deep Cleansing: Enough Collagen Hydro Moisture Cleansing Massage Cream gently removes impurities, makeup, and excess oil from the skin, leaving it clean and refreshed.
Hydrating Formula: Enriched with collagen, this cleansing cream hydrates and nourishes the skin, helping to maintain its moisture balance and improve elasticity.
Massage Benefits: The creamy texture of the cleanser allows for a luxurious massage experience, promoting circulation and relaxation while cleansing the skin.
Suitable for All Skin Types: Gentle and non-irritating formula suitable for all skin types, including sensitive skin.
Large Size: Generous 10.14 fl oz / 300ml size ensures long-lasting use and great value for money.
 
How To Use
When using as a cleansing cream: Take a proper amount and rub it on the whole face softy to make it blended with makeup and then wipe it out with tissue. Wash it with foam cleansing.

 

When using as a massage cream: After refining skin tone with tonic, take a proper amount and massage it on the whole face evenly and then wipe it out lightly with tissue. Wash it with foam cleansing.
 
Key Ingredients
Purified water, mineral oil, cetyl alcohol, propylene glycol, polysorbate 60, glyceryl stearate, PEG-100 stearate, petrolatum, dimethicone, triethanolamine, carbomer, methylparaben, propylparaben, Hydrolyzed collagen, fragrance, disodium EDTA, yellow No. 4, blue No. 1

product_name: Retino Collagen Small Molecule 300 Tightening Cream Pack 80ml
description:
Description



A cream-type peel-off pack containing 73% Small Molecule Collagen Extract and Retinal that tightens saggy pores, forms a non-stuffy collagen moisture shield, and provides a dewy glow effect
01 Original prescription made by CKDHC, Korea's leading healthcare company

- Contains 73% 300 Dalton Small Molecule Collagen to boost skin elasticity

- Helps firm skin and produce collagen with stabilized 3rd generation Retinal

- Helps retain collagen by supporting it with Hyaluronic Acid and Elastin

- Contains Sunflower Seed Oil, Safflower Seed Oil, Argan Kernel Oil and Camellia Seed Oil to help moisturize and nourish skin

02 Is it a cream or a pack?

A moist peel-off pack in a cream formula that eliminates the dryness of peel-off packs, but maintains the tightening effect.

Becomes transparent as collagen and active ingredients are absorbed after 30-40 minutes of use.

(Absorption level varies depending on skin condition. The drier and rougher the skin, the faster it becomes transparent.)

03 A porous cream-type peel-off pack formula that doesn't clog skin

A collagen moisture shield naturally forms after application to hydrate skin with Small Molecule Collagen, and provide a subtle collagen dewy glow without being oily or greasy

04 Efficacy verified by clinical trials

Completed pore size reduction / pore elasticity improvement / skin illumination improvement / hypoallergenic tests
How To Use
01 After cleansing, evenly apply a sufficient amount to a dry face, avoiding eye areas, eyebrows and lips.

02 After about 30-40 minutes, peel off the transparent film formed after absorption from bottom to top, starting from the edge.

03 Gently pat the remaining content on your face to absorb.

(Drying time may vary depending on the amount used and your skin type / Can be used about 10 times when using 5ml at a time / There may be individual differences)

description:
Description

This sleeping pack helps to soothe the skin exhausted from the damaging UV rays and other environmental stressors overnight. It is formulated with skin-identical ingredients like Hyaluronic Acid and Ceramide, which strengthen the skin barrier and protect it from the harmful environmental stressors.This product forms a healthy moisture barrier that prevents water loss and keeps skin well-hydrated overnight. Treat your sleep-deprived skin with PURITO Dermide Cica Barrier Sleeping Pack.
Centella Asiatica is most well-known for its wound-healing abilities. So-called “tiger grass” from the legend where tigers would roll around in the plant after a battle in an effort to soothe their wounds. CICA soothes and reduces skin inflammation.
Squalane prevents the evaporation of moisture from the skin and soothes its texture. It is non-irritating, making it great for people with all skin types including sensitive skin.
Ceramide NP is a mild ingredient that does not cause skin irritation due to its structure that is similar to skin lipid. It strengthens the skin barrier protecting from harmful external effects. It keeps skin hydrated by sealing in moisture, preventing evaporation of the water, and maintaining a healthy balance of oil and water.

description:
Description


- A meticulously formulated blend of peptides, ceramides, and panthenol. This dermatologist-tested, fragrance-free cream offers a rich, thick texture that deeply hydrates, leaving your skin supple and moisturized throughout the day. Specially designed for sensitive, dry, or mature skin, our cream charges moisture deep into your skin, nourishing and fortifying your skin's natural barrier from within.
- Peptide: Peptides are the building blocks of collagen and elastin fibers that are found in our skin. It Smoothes fine lines, increases collagen production, decreases the appearance of pores.
- Ceramide: Ceramides are lipids that make up to 50% of the skin composition to form the natural skin barrier. It plays an integral role in skin integrity, protection against the elements and skin structure. Without adequate ceramides, the skin barrier loses its integrity and becomes prone to various skin disorders and skin barrier dysfunction.
- Panthenol: Also called pro-vitamin B5 is both an emollient and humectant with exceptional moisturizing benefits. It helps strengthen the skin barrier and serves as a protection against environmental stressors, providing continuous improvements to skin's health.
Thick soothing and hydrating cream contained in a sophisticated airless pump jar for improved hygiene.
How To Use

Keep pressure pump closed, as it is an airless system. Press pump evenly from both sides for easy application. Equal pressure must be applied for the pump to work!

reviews.title: Impressive balm you cannot find elsewhere
reviews.content: I’ve been using this balm, and I’m genuinely impressed! In my 30s, the droopy eyes and dark circles started becoming more noticeable, so I was on the hunt for something effective. This unique balm-type care gave me a whole different feeling! The texture is just right—not too thick or greasy, and it absorbs quickly. I have sensitive skin, and I'm happy to report that this balm doesn’t cause any irritation or stinging, even when applied near my eyes. What really stands out is the difference it’s made. My eyes look more lifted and the dark circles have definitely lightened. I look more awake and refreshed, which is exactly what I was hoping for. Overall, the Ribornic Eye Lifting Cream has become a staple in my routine. If you’re dealing with droopy eyes or dark circles, give this a try—I’m glad I did!

description:
Description


This cream is formulated with a 99.4% pure glutathione capsule that offers glowing and volume to the skin.

Offers lifting of the wrinkle area and deep neckline with only use once.

Consisted with Pro Peptide and Elastic Peptide with the Hydro Ceramide offers strong hydration and tight wrapping the hydration.

Hypoallergenic tested with the wrinkle and whitening improvement tested.

Why Choose Capsule Formulation?
The glow capsules in the formula are absorbed deeply into the skin, delivering an immediate radiant effect. Using advanced Korean technology, the often challenging-to-handle glutathione is encapsulated within phospholipid capsules that mimic the skin's structure, ensuring maximum absorption and effectiveness.


What is Glutathione?
Glutathione is widely recognized in Korea as an effective ingredient for brightening skin. It is particularly beneficial for those with sensitive or dull skin. In Korea, glutathione is also celebrated for its anti-aging and protective benefits. When incorporated into skincare products using advanced technology, glutathione ensures maximum absorption and efficacy. This makes it a cherished ingredient for achieving radiant and youthful skin.
How To Use
Massage a moderate amount into the skin at the last step of the skincare and dab for better absorption.

description:
Description

What it is
Introducing our 'Triple Collagen Cream' – a powerhouse of hydration and skin barrier reinforcement.
With a blend of collagen, niacinamide, and nourishing oils, this cream enhances elasticity, firmness, and resilience.
Elevate your skincare routine and unveil a radiant complexion with 'Triple Collagen Cream' – your go-to solution for a strengthened skin barrier.

What is special
Helps reverse the signs of aging in as fast as 2 weeks by tackling three major skin concerns, all in one cream. Formulated with up to a total of 16 patented ingredients for pore care, skin elasticity, and dark spots, Triple Collagen Cream is a dermatologically tested cream that effectively helps reduce the signs of aging. It is also certified free from 15 toxic ingredients, making it safe even for sensitive skin.

Who needs it:
For matured skin type who are looking for an all-rounded cream
For all skin types who want to slow down the signs of aging

How To Use

1. Use at the final step of your skincare routine
2. Scoop out product and apply evenly onto face
3. Spread the product gently across entire face moving from center outwards
4. Gently pat remaining product into skin for better absorption

TIPS!
Mix with makeup products to prevent cakey makeup. Essential for those who wish to have glowing complexion after makeup!

description:
Description

A transparent collagen jelly cream that provides anti-aging benefits to enhance facial contours, promote firmness, and achieve a polished and glowing complexion.
Immediately after application, the skin restores its natural inner radiance with tightened, radiant, volumized 'Korean Glass Glow' effect.
How To Use

Apply a quarter amount of jelly cream morning and evening to face and décolletage(neck&chest), after applying targeted serums that address your individual skin concerns.

1. Morning Skincare

After cleansing, apply a moderate amount of the jelly cream to your face. Gently pat or massage. Allow the product to fully absorb into your skin before proceeding with your makeup application.

2. Evening Skincare
After cleansing, apply a generous amount of the jelly cream avoiding the areas around the eyes and mouth. Allow it to fully absorb into your skin before going to bed.

description:
Description

Introducing the Deep Vita C Capsule Cream, a revolutionary skincare solution designed to care for uneven skin tone and spots, leaving your skin bright, radiant, and even-toned. This customizable cream features a unique dual-texture formula, combining a Vitamin Capsule cream with a transparent gel.

The Vitamin Capsule contains Sea Buckthorn Extract at an impressive 50% concentration, along with 5% Niacinamide and Pure Vitamin C, encapsulated to maintain freshness and potency with each use. Say goodbye to oxidizing issues common in Vitamin skincare, as our exclusive technology ensures efficient delivery for maximum effectiveness.
The transparent gel component is infused with Ferulic Acid, Vitamin E, Q, and P, providing hydration and glow with minimal irritation. Its light texture allows you to customize the capsule-to-gel ratio according to your skin type, ensuring a stable, soothing blend that absorbs easily into the skin for everyday use.

Our dual-texture cream is gentle yet effective, allowing you to tailor the formula to suit your skin's needs. Experience the power of stabilized liposome capsules, designed to enhance the delivery of Vitamin C to the skin for optimal results.
With Medicube's exclusive technology, you can trust that our formulation offers superior efficacy compared to other liposomal Vitamin formulas.

Incorporate the Deep Vita C Capsule Cream into your daily skincare routine and follow up with sunscreen in the morning to maximize results.
Say hello to brighter, more radiant skin with our innovative Vitamin Capsule Cream.
How To Use

Mix the vitamin capsule and transparent gel in a suitable ratio based on your skin type. For a lighter feel, increase the ratio of the gel, while for more hydration and elasticity, increase the ratio of the capsule. Apply the mixture morning and evening to face and neck, after serum.
Key Ingredients
Hippophae Rhamnoides Water, Glycerin, Water, Niacinamide, Methylpropanediol, Propanediol, 1,2-Hexanediol, Butylene Glycol, Dipropylene Glycol, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Glycereth-26, Ethylhexyl Palmitate, Cetearyl Alcohol, Arginine, Carbomer, Ammonium Acryloyldimethyltaurate/VP Copolymer, Cetearyl Olivate, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil, Sorbitan Olivate, Simethicone, Polyglyceryl-10 Laurate, Ethylhexylglycerin, Adenosine, Fragrance, Polyacrylate-13, Glycine Soja (Soybean) Oil, Disodium EDTA, Polyisobutene, Hydrolyzed Sclerotium Gum, Glyceryl Stearate, Gluconolactone, Polysorbate 20, Sorbitan Isostearate, Hydrogenated Lecithin, Bixa Orellana Seed Oil, Polyglyceryl-10 Stearate, Alpha-Arbutin, Panthenol, Sodium Ascorbyl Phosphate, Pentylene Glycol, Ferulic acid, Tocopherol, Ascorbyl Glucoside, 3-O-Ethyl Ascorbic Acid, Bisabolol, Ascorbic Acid, Hydroxyphenyl Propamidobenzoic Acid, Pyridoxine, Ubiquinone, Biotin, Folic Acid, Sodium Hyaluronate, Ascorbyl Propyl Hyaluronate, Ascorbyl Palmitate, Cyanocobalamin, Thiamine HCl, Riboflavin, Linoleic Acid, Beta-Carotene, Rutin, Hydroxycinnamic Acid

description:
Description

A balm stick based on retinol and bakuchiol that will help moisturize the skin, prevent signs of aging, provide a lifting effect and give the skin elasticity and firmness. Provides deep hydration.

Contains high levels of nutrients: Bakuchiol liposomes + retinol liposomes, plus 84% highly concentrated microbiome ingredients.
The essence has a creamy milky texture.
Skin type: dry, normal, combination, sensitive

How To Use
Morning and night apply balm in the skin for absorption.
Key Ingredients
* Retinol is a powerful anti-aging active,which accelerates cell regeneration processes in the epidermis, gives a lifting effect, increases the elasticity and firmness of tissues, has a slight brightening effect.
* Bakuchiol is a plant and softer analog of the famous retinol. Stimulates the production of natural collagen in the cells, fights wrinkles, improves skin elasticity and suppresses the production of melanin.
* Grape extract stimulates the production of collagen and elastin, which help reduce wrinkles, increase skin tone and tighten it;
* Peptide complex – strengthens the skin's protective barrier, works with wrinkles;
* Shea butter helps to moisturize rough and dry skin, forming a protective film of moisture.

description:
Description


MIGUHARA Cica Bakuchiol Erasing Cream is a facial moisturizer that contains cica, also known as centella asiatica, which is a plant that has been used in traditional Chinese medicine for centuries. It is believed to have anti-inflammatory, antioxidant, and wound-healing properties.
The cream also contains hyaluronic acid, which is a humectant that helps to keep the skin hydrated. It also contains niacinamide, which is a form of vitamin B3 that has been shown to improve skin texture and reduce the appearance of wrinkles and fine lines.
The Miguhara Cica Erasing Cream is suitable for all skin types, including sensitive skin. It can be used morning and night after cleansing and toning the skin.
Here are some of the benefits of using the Miguhara Cica Erasing Cream:
-Hydrates the skin
-Calms and soothes irritated skin
-Reduces the appearance of wrinkles and fine lines
-Brightens the complexion
-Strengthens the skin barrier

description:
Description


A hydrating pudding-like face cream offers rich moisture and nourishment to skin for a plump and glowy look.
Features an oil-in-water gel system that enables quick absorption to better deliver moisture to dry skin while forming a protective film on skin to prevent water loss.
Packed with 20 types of hydrating ingredients including Ectoin, Ceramide NP and Camellia Japonica Seed Oil to provide intensive moisture to skin and keep skin hydrated all day long, achieving a healthy-looking and shiny complexion.
Comes with a lightweight and refreshing texture that adheres to skin seamlessly without any sticky feeling.
Hypoallergenic tested.

How To Use
As the last step of your skincare routine, apply a moderate amount onto skin and lightly pat for better absorption.

description:
Description


- A gentle yet powerful mud cream mask thoroughly removes skin impurities and dead skin cells clogged inside pores with moisturizing aftercare to keep skin clean and plump.
- Formulated with Amazon White Clay and 250,000ppm of Kaolin to gently remove excess sebum, dead skin cells and dirt from skin and clear clogged pores for achieving healthy and glowy skin.
- Packed with Hyaluronic Acid, Ceramide NP and Opuntia Ficus-Indica Stem Extract to replenish rich moisture to dry skin and prevent skin from dehydration after deep cleansing.
- Effectively calms irritated and sensitive skin with Ivy Leaf/Stem Extract and Centella Asiatica Extract.
- Hypoallergenic tested.
How To Use
1. Prep your skin with toner after cleansing. You can steam your face during shower or with hot towel for 30 seconds to achieve a better cleansing effect.
2. Apply a moderate amount evenly onto face, avoiding eye and mouth areas.
3. Rinse off thoroughly with lukewarm water.

reviews.title: Radiant Glow with NEEDLY Vita C Glow Toning Cream
reviews.content: I’ve been using the NEEDLY Vita C Glow Toning Cream for a few weeks now, and it’s truly transformed my skincare routine. This cream boasts a lightweight, gel-like texture that absorbs quickly without leaving any sticky residue. Infused with a Vita C complex, including Kakadu plum, Citrus Junos, and Grapefruit extracts, it delivers a potent dose of antioxidants to brighten and even out my skin tone. I’ve noticed a significant reduction in dullness, and my complexion appears more radiant and refreshed. The added niacinamide and panthenol provide excellent hydration, leaving my skin feeling soft and supple throughout the day. I appreciate that it’s gentle enough for daily use, both morning and night, and it sits well under makeup without causing any pilling. Overall, the NEEDLY Vita C Glow Toning Cream has become a staple in my regimen, delivering noticeable brightening effects and lasting hydration.

description:
Description


SYNTHESIS OF COLLAGEN: Contains mineral water component, which accelerates the formation of collagen in the skin. The decrease of collagen leads to the enlarged size of the pores, explaining the importance of collagen in the skin.
IMPROVE ELASTICITY: The combination of the ingredients (elastin, hyaluronic acid, fibroblast) form the skin's elastic fibers, preventing the pores from loosening.
SMOOTH SKIN: The skin filled with collagen and supporting components improves pore size and provides a radiant look as a result of the smooth skin retrieved with increased elasticity.
ABILITY TO ABSORB COLLAGEN: Collagen can only be absorbed through the skin with a molecular weight of 500Da and below. This cream is infused with collagen molecules that are 243Da to increase absorption.
HYPOALLERGENIC: Safe for all skin types, our cream is formulated without irritants and all harmful ingredients, making it the perfect moisturizer for sensitive skin.

reviews.title: Soothing and Lightweight – Great for Redness
reviews.content: Rating: ★★★★☆ (4/5) Review: I’ve been using this soothing cream for a while, and I think it’s a great option if you’re looking for something lightweight and calming. The texture is very light and absorbs quickly, which makes it perfect for layering under sunscreen or makeup without feeling heavy or greasy. What I really liked about it is how it helps reduce redness and calm irritated skin — I noticed a difference especially when my skin was feeling sensitive or stressed. Even though it’s not the most hydrating cream out there, it works well if your skin tends to get oily or if you just need something gentle to balance your skin barrier. It didn’t clog my pores or cause any breakouts, which is always a win. I wouldn’t recommend it as a heavy-duty moisturizer for dry skin types, but for combination or sensitive skin, it’s a solid choice. Pros: • Lightweight and absorbs quickly • Helps reduce redness and calm irritation • Doesn’t clog pores • Great for sensitive or oily skin Cons:

description:
Description


Introducing the Dynasty Cream, now in an elegant 100ml edition, celebrating its popularity and effectiveness as Beauty of Joseon's signature product. This beloved cream, known for its rich, creamy texture, is now available in a grander size for extended nourishment. Infused with ingredients like rice bran water, ginseng water, squalane, and niacinamide, it's more than a moisturizer - it's a tribute to your skin's health and radiance. Experience deep hydration and balanced care with this luxurious, all-in-one formula that embodies the essence of traditional Korean beauty.
* Long-lasting moisture
Enriched with 2% niacinamide and 2% squalane, it balances oil and moisture and protects skin from external stimuli.

* Subtle glow finish
This cream provides a gentle, glowy finish.
It creates a natural and healthy glow when used with foundation.

How To Use

Apply proper amount of this cream on your face at the last stage of your skincare routine. Pat with your fingers to aid absorption.
Key Ingredients
Rice bran water 29%
Rice bran is the finest inner bran of milled rice. In the Joseon Dynasty, rice bran water was used like the toner of today. It was called 'Beauty Water', used for beautiful skin. Rice bran, rich in amino acids, minerals, and vitamin E, helps to keep the skin moist and healthy.

Ginseng root water 5%
Ginseng is the most important herbal ingredient in Korean history. In the Joseon Dynasty, it was called 'Shincho', meaning herb from the gods. The rich saponin contained in ginseng helps to make the skin healthier and more energized.

Squalane 2%
Squalane, which has properties similar to sebum, helps to balance oil and moisture and acts as a moisture barrier to protect the skin from external stimuli.

Niacinamide 2%
Niacinamide is a water-soluble B vitamin.
It helps to prevent excessively dry or oily skin by regulating sebum secretion.
extra_description: Apply proper amount of this cream on your face at the last stage of your skincare routine. Pat with your fingers to aid absorption.

description:
Description

Concentrated 0.3% pure retinol cream formula that promotes smooth skin texture and visibly firm skin
• Diminish the look of fine lines & deep wrinkles
• Skin Firming & Smoother
• Even skin texture & tone
• Improve the appearance of pores
Suggested Use

* KEEP REFRIGERATED (3-10℃). Please use immediately after purchase and store upright in refrigerator once opened.

* Have an ‘adaption period’ when using retinol 

WEEK 1~2 
• Frequency : use 3 times a week at night
• How to Use : start with 0.3 of cream to concerned areas. Gradually increase frequency and areas of application.

WEEK 3~ 
• Frequency : may apply every other day at night
• How to use : apply pea-sized amount and may spread over entire face

* To maintain the freshness of retinol ingredients, avoid storing in high temperatures and direct sunlight.
* Since this product can increase sensitivity to sunlight, use sunscreen while using the product.
* Do not pair with any scrub, peeling or exfoliating product as it can irritate the skin.
Full Ingredients

Water, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Butylene Glycol, Glycerin, Glycine Soja (Soybean) Oil, Tocopherol, Tocopheryl Acetate, Cetearyl Alcohol, Trehalose, Panthenol, Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea) Butter, Ammonium Acryloyldimethyltaurate/VP Copolymer, Dimethicone, Glyceryl Polymethacrylate, Polyglyceryl-10 Stearate, Hydrogenated Lecithin, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil, Hydroxyethyl Acrylate/Sodium Acryloyldimethyl Taurate Copolymer, Carbomer, Retinol(0.3%), Tromethamine, Glyceryl Stearate, Polysilicone-11, Sodium Sulfite, Daucus Carota Sativa (Carrot) Root Extract, Allantoin, Glyceryl Caprylate, Propanediol, Oryza Sativa (Rice) Bran Wax, Tocotrienols, Stearic Acid, Polyglyceryl-3 Methylglucose Distearate, Palmitic Acid, Ethylhexylglycerin, Disodium EDTA, Adenosine, Sodium Hyaluronate, Sorbitan Isostearate, 1,2-Hexanediol, Elaeis Guineensis (Palm) Oil, Hydrolyzed Hyaluronic Acid, Beta-Carotene, Sodium Hyaluronate Crosspolymer, Myristic Acid, Hyaluronic Acid, Lauric Acid, Sodium Acetylated Hyaluronate, Ascorbic Acid, Limnanthes Alba (Meadowfoam) Seed Oil, 3-O-Ethyl Ascorbic Acid, Glutathione

product_name: Deep Moisture & Skin Repair Cream Duo
description:
Instagram에서 이 게시물 보기            STYLEKOREAN(@stylekorean_global)님의 공유 게시물
Description345 Relief Cream

345 Relief Cream is a regenerating ointment gel cream rich in nutrients that skillfully combines ingredients to address blemishes, nourish the skin, and provide soothing care, resulting in a well-rounded skincare solution. 
This lightweight post-acne cream effectively tends to acne aftermath without a heavy feel. Its multi-layered cream structure offers a through and lasting skincare by catering to various skin needs, ensuring continuous hydration and nourishment. 
This cream contains a potent blend of Niacinamide, Panthenol, and Opuntia Ficus-Indica Stem Extract, each present in significant concentrations (10,000ppm), delivering numerous benefits for the skin. 
Niacinamide, or Vitamin B3, enhances the skin's moisture barrier, regulates oil production, fades dark spots, and promotes an even skin tone. Panthenol provides effective hydration, aids in healing minor irritations, and soothes redness. 
Opuntia Ficus-Indica Stem Extract offers exceptional hydration and is ideal for dry or sensitive skin. 
The cream's multi-layered structure ensures long-lasting skin nourishment and hydration through concentrated plant-based hydrators and hyaluronic acid. This cream is a gentle and natural skincare option, free from artificial colors and fragrances, making it ideal for sensitive skin. 
It provides a silky, non-greasy, and refreshing feel due to moisturizing oils, and it's both vegan-certified and EWG Green Grade-rated, emphasizing its commitment to environmental and skin safety standards. 
147 Barrier Cream 
1 Barrier-Strengthening Ingredient: Enriched with azulene to repair and strengthen skin barriers, protecting against moisture and nutrient loss for healthier skin.
4 Nourishing Ingredients: Revitalize dull skin with the power of 4 types of ceramides. This formula delivers essential nutrients to enhance your complexion, leaving your skin radian.
7 Essential Hydrating Ingredients: Infused with 7 types of hyaluronic acid, this formula delivers deep, long-lasting hydration. Perfect for relieving dryness and keeping your skin hydrated and fresh.
Light & Non-Greasy Finish : This Cream offers a moisturizing texture with a silky finish without any greasy feeling. Its refreshing formula is ideal for use in the morning, at night, and before makeup.
[View More Information] about 345&147 Cream Duo​

reviews.title: I love it
reviews.content:
I’ve been using this gel moisturizer for a few weeks now, and honestly—it’s a game changer for my skin.

The texture is super lightweight, almost water-like, and it absorbs quickly without leaving any sticky or greasy residue. I love how refreshing it feels, especially in the morning or after a long day. It gives my skin an instant boost of hydration and makes it feel soft and plump.

What I really appreciate is that it layers well under sunscreen and makeup, which isn’t always the case with heavier creams. It also didn’t clog my pores or cause any breakouts (my skin is acne-prone and combination, for reference).

The ingredients list is simple and gentle—no fragrance, no alcohol, and it has hyaluronic acid and panthenol, which really help with moisture retention and soothing any irritation. I’ve noticed that my skin looks more balanced and less oily throughout the day since I started using it.

If you're looking for a non-irritating, no-fuss, hydrating gel that actually works, this on

description:
Description
- When you feel you need more than just hydration... 
: Yam Root Vegan Milk toner helps increase 260% of the amount of moisture. 

- Vegan Milk Complex 
: Vegan milk complex made up of 100% vegetable ingredients derived from rice, almond, oat, bean, and coconut is a great complex even for sensitive skin. 

- Contains 57% of Yam root extract from Andong, Korea 
:  Yam root, grown in sandy loam soil with good weather and drainage, helps hydrate the skin without irritating the skin barrier. 
Its rich vegetable Phyto-mucin and amino acid help maintain skin smooth. 

* What is the difference with Hyaluronic acid moist cream? 
: Hyaluronic acid moist cream is great for hydrating the skin fast and It's a great product even for oily skin. 
On the other hand, Yam root vegan milk cream is specialized in moisturization. We recommend this product for those who have dehydrated skin to improve skin barrier. 

* Does it include artificial coloring? 
: It's the color of the extracts in the product. As time goes by, its color can be changed however it's a natural thing. 
You can use it without worries! 

* Recommended to those who are concerned with dehydrated skin. 


How To Use
After washing the skin, put an appropriate amount on a cotton pad or hand and pat gently all over the face to absorb.

description:
Description


Low irritation with 0.1% pure retinol
An irritation-reduced solution created with the optimal ratio of key ingredients for first-time retinol users just starting to notice the appearance of fine lines caused by dry skin. 
The perfect choice to prevent and correct early signs of aging before they set in. 



How To Use
  -START SMALL AND SLOW!
• After using essence or serum, pat a small amount using your ring finger. Apply evenly over the face, neck, and onto parts with wrinkle concerns.
• Limit initial use to three times per week; gradually increase frequency to every other night, use as tolerated.
* Have an ‘adaption period’ when using retinol 


-WEEK 1~2 
• Frequency : use every other day at night
• How to Use : After cleansing, at the moisturizer step, apply a small amount to areas of concern.
• e.g. under eyes, mouth, forehead and neck 
(Recommended amount : 0.1ml per section / 1 grain of rice) 


-WEEK 3~ 
• Frequency : may apply everyday at night
• How to use : After cleansing, at the moisturizer step, may spread over the entire face.
* The "building tolerance" phase can be shortened or extended depending on individual differences. 
* Maintain this phase until no discomfort is experienced. 
* Gradually increase frequency and areas of application.


Key Ingredients
• Pure retinol (Vitamin A) : Decreases wrinkles and fine lines 
• Panthenol : Protects and moisturizes skin from external stimuli 
• Adenosine : Skin cell activation. Improves elasticity and wrinkles 
• Tocotrienol (Super Vitamin E) : Reduces visible signs of aging and skin damage

description:
Description

Over a million units sold in cumulative sales from 2018 to 2022 and with a product being sold every 20 seconds, this cream has become Korea’s trusted skin care solutions.
- This deeply moisturizing cream strengthens your skin's moisture barrier and prevents skin barrier damage. It leaves your skin soft by hydrating dryness.
- Visible encapsulated beads are smoothly absorbed into your skin, leaving your skin fully moisturized for 100 hours. It rejuvenates the dehydrated, dull skin with its robust moisturizing power.
- The patented triple-ingredient encapsulation technology is the best fit for your skin as it effectively delivers hydration to your skin.
- Free from animal cruelty, mineral oil, artificial fragrance, imidazolidinyl urea, artificial dyes and triethanolamine. Hypoallergenic formula.
- This intense moisturizing cream offers 120 hours of hydration with a concentrated blend of long-chain and high-density ceramides that help repair your compromised skin barrier.
- Through the gaps formed in sensitive skin, harmful substances can infiltrate. Our Capsuled Ceramide replenishes gaps in the skin and maintains a lasting presence on the skin's barrier.
- Dermatologically, allergy and sensitive skin tested, it is meticulously formulated without colorants or fragrance, ensuring a gentle touch for the skin's comfort.

How To Use
Moisturizing capsules that melt and are absorbed into the skin comfortably deliver moisturizing power to the skin. Apply gently to dry areas.

Key Ingredients
Water, Glycerin, Butylene Glycol, Butylene Glycol Dicaprylate/Dicaprate, pentaerythrityl Tetraisostearate, Cyclopentasiloxane, Squalene, cetyl Ethylhexanoate Behenyl Alcohol, Stearic Acid, Hydroxypropyl Bispalmitamide MEA, Cyclohexasiloxane, C14-22 Alcohols, Hydroxypropyl Bislauramide MEA, Mannitol, Arachidyl Alcohol, cholesterol, Polyacrylate-13, Allantoin, Copernicia Cerifera (Carnauba) Wax Extract., C12-20 Alkyl Glucoside, Arachidyl Glucoside, Dimethiconol, Polyisobutene, Phytosphingosine, Glyceryl Caprylate, Acrylates/Ammonium Methacrylate Copolymer, Carbomer, Tromethamine, Ethylhexylglycerin, Silica, Polysorbate 20, Sorbitan Isostearate, Glucose, Arachidic Acid, Palmitic Acid, Caesalpinia Sappan Stem Powder, oleic Acid, Tocopherol

reviews.title: Elizavecca Aqua Hyaluronic Acid Water Drop Cream (…
reviews.content:
**Review: Elizavecca Aqua Hyaluronic Acid Water Drop Cream (50ml) – Gifted to My 16-Year-Old Niece**

 

I recently gifted my 16-year-old niece the **Elizavecca Aqua Hyaluronic Acid Water Drop Cream**, and she has been absolutely loving it! This moisturizer has quickly become a part of her skincare routine, and after seeing the results, I can understand why.

 

### **Packaging:**

The 50ml jar comes in a cute, simple design that feels both fun and functional. The packaging is sturdy and easy to use—no messy spills, and the cream inside stays fresh. The jar’s compact size makes it easy for her to carry in her bag or travel with, so she never misses a step in her routine.

 

### **Texture and Application:**

The **Water Drop Cream** has a light, almost gel-like consistency that feels super refreshing upon application. When she applies it to her face, it transforms into tiny water droplets, which is a cool, unique feature. It absorbs quickly into the skin, leaving behind a smooth, non-greasy finish. My niece loves how lightweight it feels, and it doesn't feel heavy or sticky, which is important for her during the day, especially as a teenager with an active lifestyle.

 

### **Ingredients and Benefits:**

What makes this cream stand out is the inclusion of **Hyaluronic Acid**, which is perfect for keeping the skin hydrated. My niece, who sometimes struggles with dry patches, has noticed a visible improvement in the moisture levels of her skin. The cream provides a nice burst of hydration, leaving her skin feeling plump and refreshed without overloading it with heavy ingredients. It also feels gentle, so it's great for her young skin.

 

### **Scent:**

The cream has a very light, fresh scent that’s not overpowering—just a subtle, clean fragrance that she enjoys. It’s perfect for a teenager who doesn’t want anything too strong or artificial. It feels like a nice little spa moment every time she applies it.

 

### **Performance:**

The **Elizavecca Aqua Hyaluronic Acid Water Drop Cream** is perfect for my niece’s skin type, which tends to be a bit oily but still needs hydration. She’s been using it for a few weeks now, and it’s helped her skin feel balanced and smooth. It keeps her face moisturized throughout the day without making it feel greasy, which is a huge win. She’s especially been loving how it hydrates her skin after a long day or after swimming.

 

### **Final Thoughts:**

Overall, the **Elizavecca Aqua Hyaluronic Acid Water Drop Cream** has been a perfect gift for my 16-year-old niece. It’s light, hydrating, and refreshing, and she loves how it makes her skin feel soft and smooth without any heaviness. It’s an excellent choice for young skin, especially for teens looking for a simple yet effective moisturizer.

 

I’m so glad I picked this up for her, and I would highly recommend it to anyone looking for a gentle, hydrating cream that won’t weigh down their skin. It’s the perfect introduction to skincare for someone just starting to build their routine!

product_name: Idebenone + Blackberry Complex Intensive Total Care Cream 70ml
description:
Description

- Powerful moisture and elasticity that firmly builds up on the skin.

- Highly concentrated antioxidant solution that returns skin's youth.

- Rich nutrient and texture
The Idebenone Blackberry Intense Cream is a rich, high-nutrition cream designed to offer powerful hydration and enhance skin elasticity through a unique skin barrier strengthening complex. It features a patented skin barrier strengthening complex, DBE™ (Derma Multi Barrier Emulsion), which reinforces the skin barrier and enhances the skin's own moisturizing function. Clinically proven, the cream improves hydration for 48 hours after one use, shows improvement in all ten indicators after five uses, and enhances the skin barrier after two weeks.The cream combines the powerful antioxidant idebenone (500 ppm) with 63% blackberry complex for a synergistic effect. Idebenone is the most powerful antioxidant available, outperforming Vitamin C by four times and Coenzyme Q10 by ten times. The combination with high-purity blackberry complex maximizes the antioxidant effect. Certified EWG Green Grade, the cream is free from 20 harmful ingredients, including parabens, ethanol, mineral oils, artificial fragrances, synthetic colors, and allergenic substances. It uses no animal-derived ingredients and strictly prohibits animal testing.The rich yellow texture of the cream gently wraps the skin, leaving it feeling naturally firm and soothed. Hypoallergenic and having completed skin irritation tests, this cream is suitable for sensitive skin, ensuring safe use.
Suggested Use

Softly apply cream along the skin and pat gently for better absorption.


Full Ingredients

Rubus Fruticosus (Blackberry) 63% Fruit Extract, Euterpe Oleracea Fruit Extract, Vaccinium Angustifolium (Blueberry) Fruit Extract, Glycerin, Butylene Glycol, Water, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, 1,2-Hexanediol, Niacinamide, Cetearyl Alcohol, Cetyl Ethylhexanoate, Isododecane, Ethylhexyl Palmitate, Cetearyl Olivate, Panthenol, Polyglyceryl-3 Methylglucose Distearate, Polyglyceryl10 Laurate, Sorbitan Olivate, Sodium Polyacrylate, Hydrogenated Lecithin, Ammonium Acryloyldimethyltaurate/VP Copolymer, Acrylates/C10-30 Alkyl Acrylate Crosspolymer, Arginine, Hydrogenated Polydecene, Ethylhexylglycerin, Hydroxydecyl Ubiquinone (500ppm), Adenosine, Pentylene Glycol, Trideceth-6, Disodium EDTA, Glyceryl Acrylate/Acrylic Acid Copolymer, Sodium Hyaluronate, Caprylyl Glycol, Sodium hyaluronate Crosspolymer, Stearic Acid, Hydrolyzed Hyaluronic Acid, Hyaluronic Acid, Hydrolyzed Sodium Hyaluronate, Ceramide NP, Ceramide NS, Phytosphingosine, Cholesterol, Ceramide AS, Ceramide AP, Ceramide EOP

reviews.title: Favorite Moisturizer for Sensitive Skin
reviews.content:
I absolutely love this moisturizer. I suffer from sensitive, acne prone skin, redness, and if it gets too dry, my skin is really oily. I gave the Deep in a Barrier Cream a chance over a year ago after learning about it from a James Welsh video. I was skeptical, but I had been reading about the benefits of tamanu oil for sensitive skin and decided to give this a try. So glad I did.

Fair warning: this lotion smells quite stinky, to the point where you might reconsider putting it on your face, but once you rub/pat it in, the smell is no longer a concern. The texture of this cream isn't super heavy, but it isn't too thin, either. I love the container this is in; it's in a bottle with an easy to use pump.

For application, I use two pumps on my face, day and night, in the summer. I use three pumps at night in the winter when I need a little extra moisture. One bottle will last me about one month, so I try my best to pick up a few bottles whenever it's on sale. However, this stuff is so good that I don't even mind paying full price. This moisturizer has given me the youthful glow I've been longing for for ages.

If you've been wondering about this product, give it a chance!

reviews.title: Spot treatment
reviews.content: Skincare is a commitment to maintaining the health and vitality of the skin. Proper skincare routine includes habits & products for cleansing, hydrating, and protecting from environmental damage. Skincare is not merely a cosmetic concern; it’s essential for various reasons, primarily because the skin serves as a protective barrier against harmful elements like pollutants and UV rays. Neglecting skincare can cause acne, premature ageing, compromised immunity, etc. An effective skincare routine often includes cleansing, toning, and moisturising. Hydration is equally important, as it maintains the skin's moisture balance, preventing dryness and flakiness. Additionally, skincare routines often involve the use of sunscreen to shield the skin from the damaging effects of the sun's ultraviolet rays. This is especially pertinent in countries like India, where the sun's intensity is high, emphasising the importance of sun protection for skin health.

description:
Description


Healthy, lit-from-within dewy skin has never been easier to achieve. 
This lightweight cream absorbs quickly and helps to brighten a dull, lackluster complexion with the help of natural extracts. 
Niacinamide is a powerful brightening agent that helps to fade dark spots, acne scars and other forms of hyperpigmentation while working to strengthening the skin barrier. 
Rice extract and Korean Wild Native Flower work together to hydrate skin at a cellular level, helping to rejuvenate skin and fend off environmental aggressors. 
Antioxidant-rich green tea extract assists in balancing sebum production for a smoother, more even complexion. 
A concoction of moisturizing ingredients like shea butter, orange flower oil, lavender oil, rose oil and bergamot oil leave skin feeling soft and hydrated, but also help prevent moisture loss. 
Suggested Use



Use as the last step of your skincare routine after serums and eye creams. Take a dime size amount and spread evenly onto skin in an upward and outward motion. Gently pat into skin with the tips of your fingers for optimum absorption. For best results, use both morning and evening.

description:
Description


Lagom’s Cellus Mild Moisture Cream repairs damaged skin and strengthens sensitive skin through plant stem cell extracts including green tea callus culture extract and balsam of Peru essential oil. Skin is kept clear and decongested with proven natural ingredients including witch hazel extract and centella asiatica extract. Anti-aging ingredients include taurine repairs and fortifies the skin’s barrier, and richly hydrating, omega-3 rich macademia nut oil and shea butter promote elasticity.Like all Lagom products, this cream is formulated with DermaFlux, a hero ingredient based on Nobel Prize winning science.DermaFlux delivers hydration all the way inside the cells, rather than just to the cells or the epidermis (the skin’s outermost layer). This cream is hydrating, but absorbs extremely quickly and leaves the skin feeling ultra-smooth. This cream has a subtle scent, a combination of citrus and even a barely-detectable note of cinnamon. Ideal for all skin types, including sensitive skin. In fact, even dry skin types can enjoy this moisturizer in the summer. However, if you have very dry skin, Lagom’s Cellus Deep Moisture Cream might be your ideal pick, especially during the colder months. 
Suggested Use


Apply to skin as final step of skin care regimen, morning, evening, or both.

product_name: Aloe Vera Soothing Gel, 92% Soothing and Moisture, 300ml
description:
Description
Have a refreshing and moisturizing summer with the original Aloe Vera Soothing Gel!
One of the best-selling item over the world, this soothing gel from NATURE REPUBLIC, with contains California CCOF-certified organic Aloe Vera, is mild to the skin and can be used to moisturize everywhere including the face, arms, legs, nails, and hair.Has received vegan verification by EVE VEGAN, a French independent certification body, in which guarantees the compliance of the criteria for raw materials and manufacturing process.
This soothing gel contains 92% Aloe Vera extract, which moisturizes the skin quickly without leaving a sticky feeling behind.Mild formula free from paraben, mineral oil and artificial colors.Used for multiple purposes, mildly and moistly, without stickiness and also with a fresh feeling of use and quick absorption. 

[About Aloe Vera]
The vitamins from the Aloe Vera Extract, such as vitamins E,C and other minerals, keep the skin moisturized and protect the skin from the UV rays. The fresh Aloe Vera ingredient absorbs quickly into the skin without leaving any sticky residue behind. 

Suggested Use

Apply an appropriate amount to dry, sensitive parts of the face and body often for the best results. 
Face mask: Apply a generous layer onto the skin and leave on the skin for 20-30 minutes before washing off.
Moisturizer: Apply a thin layer onto the skin and gently pat in for better absorption.
Hair mask  : Apply a generous layer onto your hair and leave on for 30 minutes before rinsing off. 

 Tips

1.Moisturizing Sleeping Pack
Mix a few drops of facial oil with Aloe Vera Soothing Gel to make into a rich multi moisturizer. You may use it as a sleeping pack or a daily moisturizer!
Moisture-retention level increases with an extra drip of facial oil!
2.Glowing Skin Makeup
Mix makeup primer and Aloe Vera Soothing Gel at the ratio of 2:1. Apply the blend gently over your face to create a natural glowing look.
Keep your skin moisturized all day even with your makeup on!
3.Moisture Replenish for Body
Try using with rich oils like olive or argan oil for double-moisturizing effect!
Gently massage and moisturize your entire body.
4.Silky Smooth Hair Treatment
Use it like a hair serum to your split ends for an instant shine & long-lasting rejuvenation.
5.Cooling Eyes & Moisturizing Lips
Place a moistened cotton pad with Aloe Vera Soothing Gel on puffed-up eyes for cooling and on chipped lips for moisturizing.
6.Light Aftershave Soothing Gel
Use as a mild emollient treatment for soothing irritated skin after shave!
Great soothing for men's aftershave and even for women's legs!
7.Hydrating Nail Essence For Healthy Nails
If you are a big nail-art lover, should protect your nails now!
Keep your nails hydrated & healthy simply with Aloe Vera Soothing Gel. 
Ingredients



Glycerin 20%, Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Juice, Alcohol, GlycerylPolyacrylate, Dipropylene Glycol, Water, Butylene glycol, Propylene Glycol, Carbomer, PEG 60 Hydrogenated Castor Oil, Triethanolamine, 1,2-Hexanediol, Betaine, Phenoxyethanol, Disodium EDTA, Parfum, Polyglutamic acid, Sodium Hyaluronate, Calendula Officinalis Flower Extract/Melissa Officinalis Extract/Mentha Viridis(Spearmint) Extract
